song_lyrics: Tārī mūrti lāge chhe mane pyārī re, Shrī Ghanshyām Hari
Rūḍī chāl jagat thī nyārī re, Shrī Ghanshyām Hari...
Ūnḍi nābhī chhe goḷ gambhīr re, Shrī Ghanshyām Hari
Rūḍā lāgo chho Shyām sharīr re, Shrī Ghanshyām Hari. 1
Tārī chhātī upḍatī Shyām re, Shrī Ghanshyām Hari
Chhe jo Lakshmī keru Dhām re, Shrī Ghanshyām Hari. 2
Tārā mukhnī shobhā joī re, Shrī Ghanshyām Hari
Rākhu antarmā proī re, Shrī Ghanshyām Hari. 3
Tārā neṇā kamaḷ par vārī re, Shrī Ghanshyām Hari
Manjukeshānand balihārī re, Shrī Ghanshyām Hari. 4
title: Tārī mūrti lāge chhe mane pyārī re

metadata.kirtan_info:
2-39: Sadguru Manjukeshanand Swami

Category: Shri Harina Pad
